memberdef.definition: typedef int(* snd_mixer_callback_t) (snd_mixer_t *ctl, unsigned int mask, snd_mixer_elem_t *elem)
memberdef.name: snd_mixer_callback_t

briefdescription.para: Mixer callback function.

simplesect.para: 0 on success otherwise a negative error code

briefdescription.para: Mixer element callback function.

memberdef.definition: typedef int(* snd_mixer_compare_t) (const snd_mixer_elem_t *e1, const snd_mixer_elem_t *e2)
memberdef.name: snd_mixer_compare_t

briefdescription.para: Compare function for sorting mixer elements.

simplesect.para: -1 if e1 < e2, 0 if e1 == e2, 1 if e1 > e2
